title: Queen Elizabeth II – 2022 Statement on Damehood for Deborah James
author: admin
summary: The statement made by Queen Elizabeth II on 12 May 2022.
content:
The Queen has been pleased to approve that the honour of Damehood be conferred upon Deborah James.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
